text: TV host Ellen DeGenres ’ s wife Portia de Rossi has been cutting her wrists to cope with their marital problems, reports aceshowbiz. com. Ellen with her partner Portia. Last week, the couple were believed to be on the verge of divorce and jealousy was the cause of the couple ’ s problems. The two are living separately in California. “ Ellen can ’ t deal when Portia gets attached to anyone else, man or woman. But it works both ways. When Ellen kisses up to her famous friends, Portia becomes consumed with self - doubt, ” the source told National Enquirer newspaper.
